name: KŪKA
description: KŪKA is a decentralized ERC-20 token built on the Ethereum blockchain. It was launched with a renounced contract and locked liquidity to ensure long-term transparency and community trust. KŪKA positions itself as a symbolic return to simplicity and shared value—drawing from early crypto ideals of decentralization, anonymity, and collective momentum. The project is tax-free, community-driven, and focused on fostering organic participation without central control.
